name: Igor Reis Braziel
shortResume: I build modern and intuitive web applications using Next.js, React, Django, Spring Boot and more. I also have knowledge in Data Science and Machine Learning using Python. I'm a competent professional who is always working on projects and improving my skills.
about: I’m Igor, a Computer Science student at the Federal University of Goiás (since 2023) with a passion for technology, problem-solving, and continuous learning. I thrive in collaborative environments, where teamwork and shared ideas lead to stronger results, and I adapt quickly to new tools, challenges, and opportunities. With determination, focus, and dedication, I aim to grow into a professional who builds meaningful solutions and contributes positively to every team I join.

graduation.description: Professional training in scientific and technological development through advancement and application of the computing
mainPurposes: Develop Programming and Software Development Skills
Learn About Computer Systems and Architecture
Explore Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Emerging Areas

experiences.title: AI & Data Engineering Intern
experiences.company: Tribunal de Contas do Estado de Goiás (TCE-GO)
activities: Support the development of machine learning models (data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training)
Assist in building and maintaining data pipelines using Python, SQL, and ETL tools
Help collect, clean, and organize datasets from multiple sources
Collaborate on exploratory data analysis and creation of visual insights
Develop scripts to automate repetitive data processing tasks
Test and validate AI models, documenting results and performance metrics
Support deployment of models into production environments or APIs
Assist in maintaining databases, data warehouses, or cloud-based storage systems
Prepare notebooks, reports, and dashboards to present findings and progress
Experiment with LLMs, embeddings, vector databases, and prompt engineering under supervision

experiences.title: Programming and Robotics Instructor
experiences.company: PLAY ROBOTICA E GAMES EDUCACIONAL LTDA
activities: Supervise students in hands-on activities (robot assembly, game development, programming projects)
Prepare and organize teaching materials (robotics kits, computers, software)
Support the implementation of assessments and fun learning activities in the technology area
Help organize competitions or exhibitions of student projects
Install and configure educational software used in classes
Assist with basic maintenance of computers and robotics kits
Support the updating of teaching systems or platforms
Test games, applications, and digital resources that will be used in class
